start plugin:$(function(){ $('.js-timeline').timeline();});optionsavailable options listed below.$('.timeline').timeline({ autoplay: false, // value: boolean | enables autoplay autoplayspeed: 3000, // value: integer | autoplay speed milliseconds mode: 'horizontal', // value: horizontal | vertical, default horizontal itemclass: 'timeline-item', // value: item class dotsclass: 'timeline-dots', // value: dots item class activeclass: 'slide-active', // value: item dots active class prevclass: 'slide-prev', // value: item dots prev class nextclass: 'slide-next', // value: item dots next class startitem: '', // first|last|number // value: | last | number , default first dotsposition: 'bottom', // value: bottom | top, default bottom pauseonhover: true, // value: boolean | pause autoplay hover pauseondotshover: false, // value: boolean | pause autoplay a dot is hovered});demohttps://ilkeryilmaz.github.io/timelinejs/tasks basic plugin demo page documentation mouse drag touch support mobile support next/prev button advanced features (date slider, autoplay.)
